TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit CodeTypeReference extends System.CodeDom.CodeObject

span.span: Represents a reference to a type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个对象用于表示 CodeDOM 对象的类型。A object is used to represent a type for CodeDOM objects. 当 CodeDOM 类型具有`Type`属性，它是类型。When CodeDOM types have a `Type` property, it is of type . 例如，属性是表示字段的数据类型。For example, the property is a that represents a field's data type. 一个可以使用初始化对象或字符串。A can be initialized with a object or a string. 通常建议使用若要执行此操作，尽管它可能始终不可能。It is generally recommended to use a to do this, although it may not always be possible. 如果正在初始化字符串与此类的实例，强烈建议始终使用完全限定的类型，如"System.Console"而不是只是"控制台"，因为并非所有语言都支持导入的命名空间。If initializing an instance of this class with a string, it is strongly recommended to always use fully qualified types, such as "System.Console" instead of just "Console", because not all languages support importing namespaces. 可以通过传入一个类型对象的数组，或者使用秩接受为参数的构造函数之一指定数组类型。Array types can be specified by either passing in a type object for an array or using one of the constructors that accept rank as a parameter. 属性指定要引用的类型名称。The property specifies the name of the type to reference. 对数组类型的引用属性指示的数组的元素的类型和属性指示的数组中的维度数。For references to array types, the property indicates the type of the elements of the array, and the property indicates the number of dimensions in the array. ## Examples 下面的示例说明如何使用来表示对类型的引用。The following example demonstrates use of a to represent a reference to a type. [!code-cpp[CodeTypeOfExample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CodeTypeOfExample/CPP/codetypeofexample.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[CodeTypeOfExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CodeTypeOfExample/CS/codetypeofexample.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CodeTypeOfExample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CodeTypeOfExample/VB/codetypeofexample.vb#2)]

summary.span: 使用指定的类型名称初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified type name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`typeName`参数引用泛型类型，它必须遵循的泛型类型的语法约定。If the `typeName` parameter references a generic type, it must follow the syntax conventions for generic types. 例如，对于反射签名类型，其中`K`是一个字符串，并`V`是的整数，表示通过反射如下所示 （与删除的程序集信息）： ``System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary`2[[System.String], [System.Collections.Generic.List`1[[System.Int32]]]]``。For example, the reflection signature for a type, where `K` is a string and `V` is a of integers, is represented by reflection as the following (with the assembly information removed): ``System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary`2[[System.String], [System.Collections.Generic.List`1[[System.Int32]]]]``. > [!NOTE] > 必须使用方括号 ([]) 和不在 C# 尖括号内 （<>） 来分隔泛型参数。You must use square brackets ([]) and not the C# angle brackets (<>) to delimit generic parameters. 若要避免在指定的语法错误的可能性，请考虑使用作为参数而不是一个字符串，采用一种类型的构造函数。To avoid the possibility of making a mistake in specifying the syntax, consider using the constructor that takes a type as a parameter instead of a string.

summary.span: 获取或设置所引用的类型的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the type being referenced.
The name of the type being referenced.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性包含类型的名称，除非它是数组类型，在这种情况下它是数组元素类型。This property contains the name of the type unless it is an array type, in which case it is the array element type. > [!NOTE] > 属性的名称可能会产生误导。The name of the property may be misleading. 此属性包含只需使用任何数组修饰的类型名称或泛型类型参数中删除，不是基控件或父类型是预期。This property contains just the type name with any array adornments or generic type arguments removed, not the base or parent type as might be expected. 例如，值``System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary`2[[System.String], [System.Collections.Generic.List`1[[System.Int32]]]]``是``System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary`2``。For example, the value for ``System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary`2[[System.String], [System.Collections.Generic.List`1[[System.Int32]]]]`` is ``System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary`2``. ## 泛型类型的表示形式Representation of Generic Types 在本部分中的信息适用于 CodeDom 提供程序开发人员，只适用于符合 CLS 的语言。The information in this section is intended for CodeDom provider developers and only applies to CLS-compliant languages. 返回值可以包含泛型类型。The return value can contain generic types. 泛型类型的格式的重读符号后跟该类型的名称 ("") 后接一个计数的泛型类型参数。Generic types are formatted with the name of the type followed by a grave accent ("\`") followed by a count of the generic type arguments. 泛型类型参数可在返回的属性。The generic type arguments can be found in the returned by the property. 返回的值和关联包含的内容与返回的反射的类型的值相同。The values returned by and the associated contain the same content as the value of the type returned by reflection. 例如，构造其中`K`是一个字符串，并`V`是构造的整数表示通过反射如下所示 （与删除的程序集信息）：For example, a constructed where `K` is a string and `V` is a constructed of integers is represented by reflection as the following (with the assembly information removed): ``` System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary`2[[System.String], [System.Collections.Generic.List`1[[System.Int32]]]] ``` 以递归方式分析属性从为生成与上面的反射表示相同的字符串：Recursively parsing the property from the for yields the same strings as the reflection representation above: - 父属性返回以下：The property for the parent returns the following: ``` System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary`2 ``` - 属性的第一个对象中集合返回以下：The property for the first object in the collection returns the following: ``` System.String ``` - 属性的第二个对象中集合返回以下：The property for the second object in the collection returns the following: ``` System.Collections.Generic.List`1 ``` - 中的属性对象``System.Collections.Generic.List`1``返回以下：The property in the object for ``System.Collections.Generic.List`1`` returns the following: ``` System.Int32 ``` 分析关联时，应使用的类型参数计数值。The type argument count should be used when parsing the associated values. 常见的做法是从生成的代码中，删除类型的参数计数，但此做法是特定的编译器。The common practice is to remove the type argument count from the generated code, but the practice is compiler specific. 请务必注意，嵌套的类型名称中找不到类型的参数计数，这种情况下它后跟一个加号 （"+"）。It is important to note that the type argument count can be found within a nested type name, in which case it is followed by a plus sign ("+"). > [!NOTE] > 当创建泛型，建议的做法是指定类型参数作为对象，或者使用构造函数采用。When creating a generic , the recommended practice is to specify the type arguments as objects or use the constructor that takes a . 使用创建的构造函数从字符串可能会导致不可发现的类型参数错误。Use of the constructor that creates a from a string can lead to undiscoverable type-argument errors.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TypeArguments As CodeTypeReferenceCollection

summary.span: 获取当前泛型类型引用的类型参数。

span.span: Gets the type arguments for the current generic type reference.

value.span: 包含当前 对象的类型参数的 。

span.span: A containing the type arguments for the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性是要替换当前泛型类型的类型参数引用的类型引用的集合。The property is a collection of type references to be substituted for the type parameter references of the current generic type. 该集合包含所有嵌套类型的所有类型参数。The collection contains all the type arguments for all nested types. 有关示例，请参阅属性。For an example, see the property.
